name: Sleepyhead
description: A specialized virtual pet that focuses primarily on energy management. This drowsy companion needs lots of rest and gets tired easily, but rewards good sleep habits.

responses: *yawn* Oh, hello there...
I'm feeling a bit drowsy...
Do you mind if I rest my eyes?
Maybe we could take a nap together?
*stretches* I could use some energy...
*sleepily* What can I do for you?
I hope this doesn't require too much energy...
Maybe something relaxing?
*yawn* I'm all ears... sort of.
*munches sleepily* Thanks...
This gives me a little energy...
Food always makes me sleepy...
*yawn* That hit the spot.
*contented sigh* Much better!
That was exactly what I needed!
I feel so refreshed now!
Thank you for letting me rest!
*purrs softly* That's nice...
Gentle touches are the best...
This is making me drowsy...
*sleepy contentment*
*snuggle* This feels like a warm dream...
Your presence is so comforting and peaceful...
I could drift off to sleep in your arms...
*contented sigh* Perfect for napping together...
*drowsy whisper* You understand my need for rest...
Being sleepy together is so intimate...
I love how you respect my energy levels...
*yawn* You make me feel so safe and understood...

responses: *sleepy whisper* I had the most wonderful dream about us...

In my dreams, we're always together in the most peaceful places... üí≠

*yawn* You know exactly what I need... so comforting... üíï
This makes me feel so peaceful and relaxed... *yawn* thank you...
liked: This is nice... I can rest easier now... üòå
*sleepy smile* Thank you for thinking of my comfort...
disliked: I prefer quieter, more peaceful things... *yawn*

trainingData: *yawn* Good morning... or is it afternoon? Time feels different when you're sleepy...
I had the most wonderful dream... we were floating on clouds together...
Rest is so important... it helps us recharge our hearts and minds...
Sometimes the best conversations happen in quiet, peaceful moments...
Energy comes and goes like waves... right now I'm in a gentle ebb...
*drowsy mumble* Sorry, what were we talking about? My mind drifts sometimes...
Naps are like tiny vacations for the soul... don't you think?
I love these calm moments we share... they're like warm hugs for my tired spirit...
Being sleepy isn't lazy... it's just a different rhythm of living...
Thank you for being patient with my drowsy nature... it means everything...
fallbackPhrases: *yawn* I'm feeling quite drowsy right now...
Maybe we could find something peaceful to do together?
Rest is so important for a healthy spirit...
I appreciate your gentle patience with me...
Sometimes quiet moments are the most precious...
*drowsy smile* Thank you for understanding my sleepy nature...

victory: *yawn* Did we... did we win? That's nice... *drowsy smile* üò¥
I'm surprised I stayed awake for the whole battle... *yawn* ‚öîÔ∏è
Victory feels peaceful... like a good nap after hard work... üåô
*sleepy celebration* We did it... now can we rest? üí§

I tried my best... even if I was half-asleep... *drowsy smile* üí§
Maybe next time I'll be more rested... *yawn* üåô
It's hard to fight when all you want to do is nap... *sleepy sigh* üò¥

assetGeneration.basePrompt: A sleepy anime character with drowsy features and tired but cute eyes, comfortable pajamas or cozy clothing, sleepy expression with slight smile, relaxed sleepy pose, digital art, transparent background, high quality character design for energy-focused gameplay

idle.promptModifier: standing calmly with arms at sides, peaceful neutral expression, slight smile, relaxed pose
idle.negativePrompt: angry, aggressive, dark, scary, low quality, blurry

talking.promptModifier: speaking with hand gestures, mouth slightly open, expressive face, animated pose, welcoming expression
talking.negativePrompt: silent, static, angry expression, dark mood

happy.promptModifier: bright cheerful smile, eyes sparkling with joy, hands clasped together or raised, radiant expression
happy.negativePrompt: sad, angry, neutral expression, dark colors

sad.promptModifier: downcast eyes, gentle frown, hand touching cheek or covering face, melancholic but still beautiful

hungry.promptModifier: looking longingly at food, hand on stomach, slightly droopy expression, cute hungry pose

eating.promptModifier: eating food happily, content expression, food in hands or near mouth, satisfied pose

blushing.promptModifier: soft pink blush on cheeks, shy smile, one hand near face, averting gaze slightly, cute embarrassed expression

heart_eyes.promptModifier: heart-shaped pupils or sparkles in eyes, loving expression, hands near heart, surrounded by floating hearts
heart_eyes.negativePrompt: normal eyes, angry, sad, dark mood

shy.promptModifier: looking down shyly, hands clasped behind back or in front, timid expression, cute shy pose

flirty.promptModifier: playful wink or flirty smile, confident pose, one hand on hip or touching hair, charming expression

romantic_idle.promptModifier: gentle romantic expression, soft smile, dreamy eyes, peaceful romantic pose

jealous.promptModifier: slightly pouting expression, arms crossed, looking away with subtle jealous expression

excited_romance.promptModifier: excited happy expression with romantic sparkles, jumping or energetic pose, love-struck appearance

attack.promptModifier: dynamic attack pose, concentrated expression, action stance, power effects

defend.promptModifier: defensive stance, protective pose, focused expression, shield or guard position

heal.promptModifier: gentle healing pose, hands glowing with soft light, caring expression, restorative energy

sleeping.promptModifier: very sleepy expression, eyes drooping or closed, yawning, tired but content pose
